emuInput.TitMainTitle: Groom Marion White and bride Magnolia Smith White, posed in home of bride, 611 Larimer Avenue
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 14, 1962, pg. 10, reads: "White - Smith Rites - Miss Magnolia Smith of 611 Larimer Ave. became the bride of Marion White of 7925 Susquehanna St., in a wedding ceremony performed at the bride's home by the Rev. William J. Harvey III. Attendants were Edward Hill, Miss Lavern [Lauren] Carver, little Mary Wilson and Master Robbie Stevens. - Harris Photo."
